mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, pp.path, p.price, p.simple_des, p.detail_des, sc.count from tea_shopcart sc,tea_product p,tea_product_pic pp where p.id = pp.product_id and sc.product_id = p.id and pp.isDefault = 'Y' and sc.user_name = #{username}
select sum(p.price) as totalPay from tea_shopcart sc,tea_product p,tea_product_pic pp where p.id = pp.product_id and sc.product_id = p.id and pp.isDefault = 'Y' and sc.user_name = #{username}
select count(1) from tea_shopcart t where t.product_id = #{productid}
mapper.delete: delete from tea_shopcart where user_name = #{username} and product_id = #{productid}
mapper.update: update tea_shopcart t set t.count = #{count} where t.product_id = #{productid}
